question: 放る
sourceAnswer:
<read>ほうる</read>|<read>ほる</read>:: to{} throw/fling/hurl/toss | neglect/abandon/leave-alone/give-up-on/leave-undone/leave-unfinished
<read>ひる</read>:: to{} expel-(from-the-body)/excrete/defecate/give-birth
<read>まる</read>:: to{} excrete-(faeces,-urine)
<read>はなる</read>:: to: get-free/be-freed/be-released
